comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Due to DEPTH infrastructure changes, hosted Archiva solution has been redeployed.
To prevent any problem accessing Archiva repository with other classical ports than 80 or 443, easySDI Archiva instance will be moved to https://archiva.depth.ch/archiva/repository/easysdi; older URL will be unavailable since 1st of January 2015.

POM definitions will be changed to point on new URL.
